paper.title: On the weight sign of the global minimum variance portfolio
paper.abstract: We investigate the one-to-one mapping between the global minimum variance portfolio and regression hedge coefficients. The analysis demonstrates that assets with a superior (inferior) regression hedged effect in terms of marginal return create a negative (positive) weight. The asset has a weight of zero when both the asset and regression hedge enjoy the same marginal return. In addition, we develop a modified information ratio to compare the magnitudes of two arbitrary weights of the global minimum variance portfolio. From the perspective of hedging, we determine that the asset with a higher modified information ratio yields a larger weight. (C) 2016 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究全球最小方差投资组合的权重符号及其与回归对冲系数的关系，并开发了改进的信息比率来比较权重大小。这些内容直接涉及投资组合的构建和优化，属于投资组合管理领域。
